card_text: 2+ Machine monsters$NIf this card is Link Summoned: You can activate this effect; Special Summon 3 "Mecha Phantom Beast Tokens" (Machine/WIND/Level 3/ATK 0/DEF 0), also you cannot Link Summon for the rest of this turn. Once per turn: You can Tribute up to 3 monsters, then apply 1 of these effects, based on the number Tributed;$N●1: Destroy 1 card on the field.$N●2: Special Summon 1 "Mecha Phantom Beast" monster from your Deck.$N●3: Add 1 Trap from your GY to your hand.
